results.name: a(n) = Card{ (x,y,z) | lcm(x,y,z)=n }.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
O. Bagdasar, On some functions involving the lcm and gcd of integer tuples, Scientific Publications of the State University of Novi Pazar, Appl. Maths. Inform. and Mech., Vol. 6, 2 (2014), 91--100.
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = 1+3*e+3*e^2 for prime p and e >= 0. - _Werner Schulte_, Nov 30 2018
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, May 20 2002
